name: Bready or Not!
description:
Bready or not, here comes the new millennium! Unfortunately, the 2000s are already off to a crumby start for normal office-worker Norman. Join Norman in this 2D side-scrolling action game as he combats his greatest fear: the office toaster come alive.

Controls: [A] and [D] keys to move, [left click] to shoot butter

Developers:
Aaron Isara (Programming)
Emily Lin (Writing)
Victoria Lam (UI/Art/Programming)
Mike Han (UI/Programming)
Matthew Workman (Programming)
Celebi Law (Programming)
Ray Hsiao (Art/UI/Sound)
Adalia Zhou (Art)

Special thanks to Nadya Higgins and Kendra Lin for lending us their talents in designing and creating the original lineart for our protagonist!

SFX courtesy of Zapsplat

Submission for ACM Studio Snowjam 2021 under the theme "Toasty"

Revamp of mundaydreaming from LD49
